short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to track your scrolling distance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wonder how far you scroll in a day? Use Scroll Tracker to view your scrolling stats across a variety of websites!

Scroll Tracker is open source on GitHub: github.com/cjdenio/scroll-tracker
